job_description:
Senior DevSecOps Engineer

We are seeking a Senior DevSecOps Engineer to lead cybersecurity, infrastructure automation, and DevSecOps practices as we transition to a secure, scalable, and modern engineering environment. This role will strengthen 2Base’s security posture, modernize pipelines, and guide the team toward a secure-by-design culture. You will collaborate with engineering, product, and leadership teams to ensure systems, applications, and cloud environments are secure, reliable, and future-ready.

Key Responsibilities

  • Define, implement, and enforce security standards, policies, and best practices across cloud and on-prem environments.
  • Conduct security risk assessments, vulnerability scans, penetration testing, and execute mitigation plans.
  • Architect and enhance secure CI/CD pipelines with automated compliance checkpoints.
  • Promote a "Security First" culture across engineering teams.
  • Monitor, detect, investigate, and respond to security threats and breaches.
  • Develop Infrastructure-as-Code practices using Terraform, Ansible, and automation frameworks.
  • Design secure cloud architectures across AWS, Azure, or GCP.
  • Build and secure containerized environments with Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Implement secure monitoring, logging, SIEM, and alerting systems.
  • Improve system reliability, scalability, performance, and fault tolerance.
  • Mentor DevOps engineers in secure development and operational excellence.
  • Lead technical strategy, tool selection, and DevSecOps roadmap execution.
  • Collaborate with BA, PM, and Engineering teams to align security and delivery goals.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 4–8 years of experience in DevOps, Cloud, or Infrastructure engineering with security exposure.
  • Hands-on CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions).
  • Strong expertise in AWS, Azure, or GCP with secure architecture focus.
  • Proficiency in Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform, Ansible).
  • Experience securing Docker and Kubernetes environments.
  • Networking knowledge (LAN/WAN, firewalls, load balancers).
  • Familiarity with security frameworks (OWASP, NIST, CIS).
  • Monitoring/logging tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, CloudWatch, SIEM).
  • Scripting skills (Python, Bash, Shell).
  • Excellent troubleshooting, analytical, and communication skills.

Contact: Share your resume at careers@2basetechnologies.com
summary: Lead cybersecurity and DevSecOps to secure cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Drive secure-by-design culture and modern engineering practices.

job_description:
Senior Business Analyst

At 2Base, we are rebuilding the Business Analyst function into a world-class, product-minded, clarity-driven team. This role is not a documentation role, not a screen updater role, and not a support role. This is a core Business Analyst position responsible for functional modeling, system reasoning, requirement clarity, and building the foundation for correct development.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead requirement workshops, client calls, and discovery discussions to understand business needs clearly.
  • Ask deeper questions, challenge assumptions, and validate the true business intent behind every requirement.
  • Convert ambiguous client inputs into structured, logical, and actionable functional understanding.
  • Break large features into modules, workflows, components, and clear dependencies.
  • Build strong system-level understanding involving APIs, integrations, data flow, and backend considerations.
  • Translate business processes into functional logic that development teams can execute.
  • Decompose requirements into use-case flows, system behaviors, edge cases, alternate paths, validation rules, and dependencies.
  • Prepare high-quality documentation, including BRD, FRD, SRS, workflows, state diagrams, data-flow diagrams, API requirement specs, and acceptance criteria.
  • Ensure all documentation is clear, logical, structured, testable, and ready for developers and QA to use.
  • Collaborate closely with developers, architects, QA, and product owners to validate feasibility and align understanding.
  • Ensure QA teams can derive test cases effectively from your functional logic and acceptance criteria.
  • Communicate confidently with clients, handle requirement discussions smoothly, and clarify misunderstandings immediately.
  • Push back politely on unclear or changing requirements and ensure final decisions are documented properly.
  • Maintain requirement traceability throughout the lifecycle and ensure zero ambiguity during handover to development.
  • Own the entire requirement lifecycle from discovery to development readiness with high accountability.
  • Drive clarity across teams by ensuring every requirement is complete, validated, and logically consistent.

Required Skills & Experience

  • Minimum 4+ years of core Business Analyst experience with strong analytical and system-level thinking.
  • Ability to break down complex requirements into clear components, workflows, and functional logic.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication with confidence in client interactions and clarifications.
  • Proven experience in preparing SRS, BRD, FRD, workflows, and acceptance criteria with high clarity.
  • Ability to challenge assumptions politely, ask the right questions, and ensure zero ambiguity.
  • Strong collaboration experience with development, QA, architects, and cross-functional teams.
  • Understanding of API behaviors, integrations, data flows, and multi-module system interactions.
  • Ability to run requirement discussions, workshops, and independently lead discovery sessions.
  • Exposure to SaaS, scalable products, automation, or AI-supported systems is an added advantage.
  • Demonstrated ownership of requirements end-to-end, ensuring developer-ready and testable outputs.
  • Not suitable for UI-only thinkers, passive communicators, template-based writers, or those relying on AI for answers.
  • Success is defined by clear, testable requirements, zero rework, strong cross-team alignment, and confident communication.
  • Candidates must align with 2Base’s structured thinking, clarity-driven culture, and transformation of the BA function.

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or related field
  • 4 to 8 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst
  • Experience in SaaS or scalable product environments
  • Exposure to AI/Automation, integrations, or multi-module systems
  • Ability to run independent client workshops
  • Must have independently handled requirement ownership for at least one full project lifecycle

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com.
summary: Senior Business Analyst role at 2Base requiring 4+ years of experience in functional modeling, system reasoning, and requirement clarity. Owns end-to-end requirements, collaborates with cross-functional teams, and ensures developer-ready outputs.

job_description:
Business Analyst

The Business Analyst plays a key role in ensuring requirements are clearly understood, accurately documented, and traceable throughout the software development lifecycle. This role focuses on translating business and functional inputs into structured, standardized documentation that supports effective development, testing, and delivery. Working closely with business analysts, design teams, and technical stakeholders, the role ensures consistency, clarity, and alignment across all requirement artifacts.

Key Responsibilities

  • Create Software Requirement Specifications (SRS) based on inputs from Core Business Analysts, stakeholder discussions, and requirement walkthroughs
  • Prepare Business Requirement Documents (BRD) using approved templates while ensuring business intent and system behavior are clearly documented
  • Participate in requirement discussions to understand business objectives, functional flows, dependencies, and assumptions before documentation
  • Analyze requirements to identify gaps, ambiguities, and inconsistencies, and work with Core BAs to resolve them
  • Document functional flows, business rules, and acceptance criteria where applicable to support development and QA teams
  • Document wireframes, UI flows, validations, and UI specifications in collaboration with design and product teams
  • Maintain change logs, version history, and document updates throughout the project lifecycle
  • Create and manage traceability matrices linking business, functional, and technical requirements
  • Maintain cross-references across BRD, SRS, UI, API, and related documentation
  • Ensure documentation consistency, completeness, and alignment with approved scope and delivery timelines
  • Ensure accurate and timely PMS updates with structured documentation details
  • Support development, QA, UAT, and audit processes through clear, traceable, and up-to-date documentation
  • Assist in requirement reviews, walkthroughs, and validation sessions with internal and client stakeholders

Requirements

Required Skills and Experience

  • 1 to 4 years of experience in Business Analysis documentation or related roles
  • Strong experience in BRD and SRS creation
  • Hands-on experience with documentation templates, standards, and version control
  • Ability to document UI wireframes and functional flows clearly
  • Working knowledge of APIs and system integrations for documentation purposes
  • Experience with project management systems and documentation tools
  • Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple documents in parallel
  • Excellent written communication and stakeholder coordination skills

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field
  • 1 to 4 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com.
summary: The Business Analyst translates business needs into structured documentation, ensuring clarity and alignment across development teams. Responsibilities include creating BRDs/SRS, analyzing requirements, and maintaining traceability for project success.

job_description:
About the Job

As a specialist in electronics and software for the past 20 years, in-tech is a dynamic, fast-growing engineering company headquartered in Munich, Germany, employing around 2,350 employees globally across 20 project locations in 8 countries. in-tech develops innovative engineering solutions for the automotive, rail, aerospace, defense, and industrial sectors. We are committed to a flexible, modern work culture and work-life balance. Our colour orange stands for liveliness, warmth, and dynamism. We value a strong team spirit, fresh ideas, and a positive work culture—what we call the Orange Spirit! Since 2024, in-tech has become a subsidiary of Infosys Ltd, enabling us to offer customers comprehensive development and digitalisation services with greater offshore capability.

We are seeking a highly skilled Business Analyst who acts as a vital bridge between business stakeholders and IT teams. This role focuses on analysing and optimizing business processes and performance, enabling data-driven decision-making, and delivering sustainable business value. A particular emphasis is placed on supporting German-speaking stakeholders.

If you’re passionate about joining a growing and dynamic team with a positive culture and team spirit, we’d love to connect with you!

Responsibilities

  • Analyse and optimize financial and operational key performance indicators (KPIs) and business processes.
  • Conduct plan vs. actual analysis, identify variances, and propose actionable improvements.
  • Translate business needs into functional specifications, user stories, and process models.
  • Develop predictive models for business forecasting and scenario planning.
  • Support system implementations, upgrades, and process improvement initiatives.
  • Collaborate closely with finance, operations, and project management teams.
  • Design and develop reports, dashboards, and decision-support documentation using Power BI and SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC).
  • Ensure all solutions and recommendations align with strategic business objectives.
  • Facilitate effective communication between business stakeholders and IT teams.
  • Provide ongoing support and training to end-users on analytical tools and processes.

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in business administration, Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as a Business Analyst or in a similar analytical role.
  • Strong understanding of business processes and IT systems.
  • Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities.
  • Fluency in English; proficiency in German is highly desirable.
  • Experience with Business Intelligence (BI) tools, particularly Power BI and SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC).
  • Basic knowledge of SQL and data analysis techniques.
  • Relevant certifications such as CBAP, PMI-PBA, or equivalent are a plus.
  • Additional language skills (especially German), experience in multinational or matrix organizations, and familiarity with Agile methodologies are preferred.

Apply with Us

If you have experience and team spirit and are looking for a great place to work, start your journey with us. As part of our dedication to workforce diversity, in-tech is committed to equal employment opportunity without regard for age, race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, protected veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at india.talent@in-tech.com.
summary: Business Analyst bridges business and IT, optimizing processes and enabling data-driven decisions for German-speaking stakeholders. Requires BI tools and analytical skills.

Kameda Infologics (P) Ltd

Address: 2nd Floor, Amstor House, Technopark Campus, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695581 Website: http://www.kamedainfologics.com Closing Date: 20, Mar 2026 Job Published: 25, Feb 2026 Contact Email: preeyanka@kamedainfologics.com

Brief Description

At Kameda Infologics, we are a passionate team of technology and healthcare enthusiasts applying cutting-edge technology to solve real-world and multi-dimensional healthcare problems, driving digital transformation to meet our clients’ needs. You will be working with a unique and gifted team of clinical and technical experts, developing exciting products for our customers, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver impactful healthcare IT solutions.

We are looking for an experienced Support Lead with strong expertise in Radiology Information Systems (RIS) and Picture Archiving and Communication Systems (PACS). The candidate will lead the support function, ensure smooth operations, and act as the key escalation point for resolving complex issues. This role demands a combination of deep technical knowledge, leadership skills, and client-facing experience.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead and manage the support team, ensuring timely and effective resolution of issues related to RIS, PACS, and associated healthcare IT applications.
  • Act as a subject matter expert (SME) for RIS and PACS support.
  • Collaborate with product, development, and QA teams to address recurring issues and provide input for product improvements.
  • Conduct root cause analysis and ensure implementation of preventive measures for recurring technical problems.
  • Ensure SLA compliance and maintain high levels of customer satisfaction.
  • Mentor and guide support engineers, building their technical and customer management capabilities.
  • Prepare technical documentation, support guidelines, and knowledge base articles.
  • Work closely with clients to understand their requirements, provide solutions, and manage escalations effectively.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 7–10 years of experience in IT Support, with significant exposure to RIS and PACS.
  • Strong understanding of hospital workflows, especially radiology and imaging domains.
  • Hands-on experience in troubleshooting and resolving complex technical issues.
  • Good knowledge of healthcare standards (HL7, DICOM) and integration workflows.

job_description:

Job Summary

The candidate should be proficient in .NET Core (Web API, Swagger, EF, ADO.NET), SQL Server (Functions, CTEs, indexing strategies, optimization, debugging complex SP and optimization), and Angular, with practical experience in Azure. Hands-on experience with pipeline setup, YAML and Bicep-based deployment, Dockerization, Azure Container Apps, Azure Event Grid, and querying application telemetry from both Application Insights and Log Analytics is required. Knowledge of NoSQL databases is an added advantage. Strong technical communication skills and the ability to work independently with clients are essential.

Key Responsibilities

  • Application Design: Participate in feature discussions, story planning, and the development of scalable, high-performance applications using .NET and Azure.
  • Code Quality & Reviews: Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code. Conduct and participate in peer code reviews to ensure adherence to coding standards, performance, and security practices.
  • Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with product owners, business analysts, QA engineers, and other stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical specifications and deliver quality features.
  • Legacy Modernization: Lead or support initiatives to migrate and modernize legacy applications to Azure cloud platforms, including planning, implementation, and optimization.

Technology Stack

  • Languages & Frameworks: C#, .NET Core (5.0+), Angular (12+)
  • Frontend Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular
  • Databases: SQL Server (2019+), Entity Framework, MongoDB, Cosmos DB, OpenSearch/Elasticsearch
  • Cloud & Infrastructure: Microsoft Azure: Azure Storage, Azure DevOps, Load Balancing, Monitoring, Containerization (Docker/Kubernetes)
  • DevOps & CI/CD Tools: Git, Azure DevOps Pipelines, GitHub Actions
  • Security: Single Sign-On (SSO), Identity Server, JWT
  • Other Tools & Technologies: RabbitMQ, Redis, IIS, PowerShell, Swagger, SSIS
  • Testing & QA: xUnit, NUnit, Selenium

Preferred Skills

  • .NET
  • Angular
  • Azure
  • SQL
